name: Publishers.ReplaceEmpty
desc: A publisher that replaces an empty stream with a provided element.

items.name: init(upstream: Upstream, output: Publishers.ReplaceEmpty<Upstream>.Output)
items.desc: Creates a publisher that replaces an empty stream with a provided element.

items.name: struct Output
items.desc: A publisher that publishes elements specified by a range in the sequence of published elements.

items.name: typealias Output
items.desc: The kind of values published by this publisher.

items.name: typealias Failure
items.desc: The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

items.name: let upstream: Upstream
items.desc: The publisher from which this publisher receives elements.

items.name: let output: Publishers.ReplaceEmpty<Upstream>.Output
items.desc: The element to deliver when the upstream publisher finishes without delivering any elements.

items.name: static func == (Publishers.ReplaceEmpty<Upstream>, Publishers.ReplaceEmpty<Upstream>) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two publishers are equivalent.
